address: via Ca' Onorai 2, loc. Mottinello Nuovo
description: Housed in an early 20C farmhouse, this restaurant boasts the typical ambience of a traditional multi-generational trattoria, while the cuisine focuses on classic dishes that are typical of the Veneto. Highlights include bigoli pasta, bean soup, Vicenza-style baccalà cod and mallard duck.
